post_detail.title: Breast Cancer Awareness: Stronger Together.
post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

I assisted with the launch of the site by streamlining AJAX calls to our REST routes. In addition, I implemented a cookie-based state saving mechanism that would allow user uploaded content to display while the client app waited for the response to come from FeedMagnet.

Execution:

As part of a Breast Cancer Awareness campaign, ClickFire Media was challenged by Estee Lauder to create a web application that raised awareness by creating “Circles of Strength.” Comprised of their friends on Facebook. The website featured a video explaining the campaign, followed by various call-to-action buttons and statistics surrounding the social media engagement.
